title: Bigjigs Toys Traditional Snakes and Ladders Game - Quality Snake and Ladders Family Games for Kids and Adults, Up to 4 Players, Board Game Includes Counters & Dice
features: SNAKES AND LADDERS GAME FOR KIDS - Traditional Snakes and Ladders board game with dice and counters; a board game for 2 to 4 players - throw the dice and move along the board, watch out for the snakes
SKILL DEVELOPMENT - This snakes and ladders board game is an educational toy that develops fine motor skills, colour recognition, hand-eye coordination, basic numeracy and problem solving skills
TIMELESS GIFT - Traditional snakes and ladders board games are a timeless birthday or Christmas gift - suitable for kids aged 3 yrs +; Supplied in a quality box, great for storing when not in use
SAFE AND SUSTAINABLE WOODEN TOYS - Our wooden toys are made from premium quality, sustainably sourced wood; conforms to EN71 Toy Safety Standards and have non-toxic paints and lacquers
FAMILY FUN - 2-4 players of all ages can challenge each other to race to the 100th square, avoiding the snakes and trying to climb up the ladders along the way; 28cm W x 28cm H
